# ImAlgorithm - Modified for use with CMake and Vcpkg

ImAlgorithm is an educational tool to visualize the execution of algorithms. It uses ImGui library and C++20 coroutines.

Work in progress.

[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/C++-20-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=c%2B%2B)](https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/20)
[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/CMake-3.12+-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/release/3.12.html)
[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/vcpkg-last-blue)](https://vcpkg.io/)
[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/ImGui-1.82-blue)](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui)


## Build process
The build process requires CMake 3.12 (https://cmake.org/) or more and the vcpkg C++ package manager (https://vcpkg.io/).
All dependencies are resolved with vcpkg.
